description: Number of commutative elements in Coxeter group H_n.
references: C. Kenneth Fan, Structure of a Hecke algebra quotient. J. Amer. Math. Soc. 10 (1997), no. 1, 139-167.
C. K. Fan, A Hecke algebra quotient and some combinatorial applications. J. Algebraic Combin. 5 (1996), no. 3, 175-189.
author: _Ken Fan_
